summary: My \"Six Beautiful Characters\" converted as followers
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS AN OLD REPLACER VERSION

Released a STANDALONE VERSION at: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36362//?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Given many asked i decided to venture through that strange world, which is the Construction Kit, to try to convert my saved games (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35081/?) into followers and, well, here is my first attempt to an actual mod :)

Enjoy!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DESCRIPTION-

This mod adds six followers to the game
They are all located in the Four Shields tavern in Dragon Bridge

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-INSTALLATION-

----DEPENDENCIES----
You need to download these three mods before installing anything else:

1. Apachii SkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 (both the main file and the ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3 found in the \"optional files\")
2. Nouks hairstyles by zzjay http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26689
3. UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899 (take the one with \"everything needed for the BBP\")
---------------------------

1) Download the \"Six Beautiful Followers - Cumulative\" and extract it in your Skyrim game folder; be minful though that this archive will replace the vanilla textures for female characters

2) Enjoy


-INSTALLATION NOTE-

Not all of them are dressed exactly as in the screens because i didn\'t get all the permissions to use all the armors and because, when it comes to accessories, i don\'t know which slot to use so i made a list of the few things missing:

-ARMORS-

These are armors that you need to download and give to the characters if you want the exact look that is in the screens

Freya:
Freya is missing the
Lustmord noir tasset - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852
Prince of the woods Belt Black - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008
Vixen Panties (\"Temptress Race\" mod, it also has the armors) - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717

Hope:
Hope is missing the
Silver Hotpants - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271
Maxwell Leg Both - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14668

-ENB USED-
In case somebody wondered:
I used the \"Project ENB\" - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781
and the \"True Vision ENB\" - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15983
On my presentation screenshots

-----------------------------------------------------------P.S.------------------------------------------------------------------------

As of now,
like i said in the comments i\'m working on a standalone version, but it turned out to be more complicated than i expected, so it\'ll take some time for me to figure out how to handle this \"standalone custom companion\" thing...

For now thanks for downloading my mod and try to enjoy it as it is, i\'ll publish a standalone version as soon as i can
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-CREDITS-

I wish to say thanks to all these modders and authors from which i took a piece for either this mod or my screenshots, thankyou very much :)

Apachii
Dimon99
Anano

\"Bouncy Bodices and Booties\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271
\"Ashara Princess of the Woods - UNP\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008
\"Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22166
\"Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19004
\"Winter Is Coming - Cloaks\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486
\"TAKE NEW SLOT Glasses Ears Earring\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11068
\"Silver Armor\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22971
\"Temptress Armor / Vixen Outfit\" from \"Temptress Race\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717
\"Maxwell Outfit - UNP\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14668
\"Lustmord Vampire Armor\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852
\"UNP Jewelry\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13061
\"The Art of Magicka\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040

\"Sporty Sexy Map\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377/
\"Sporty Sexy Sweat\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-NOTE-

Given i mixed many make up, body and face mods i don\'t actually remember who to give credit to, so I\'ll just remark that none of these textures or meshes are my personal work, I just made a copy-paste work, nothing more...
So, if anyone recognises any specific texture or work from a mod on the nexus pm me and i\'ll add it in the credits section right away
author: Lucas035
